think_procedure: First, understand the function of the 'innodb_random_read_ahead' knob. It is used to enable or disable the random read-ahead feature in InnoDB. Then, identify its possible values. The possible values for this knob are 0 and 1. When set to 0, the feature is disabled. When set to 1, the feature is enabled. Therefore, it can be classified as a 'special knob' as it has a special value (0) that disables a feature, breaking the natural order.
